Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Homan/Harrison
ShortDescription: #82 buses temp. rerouted SB via Homan, Congress, Central Park, Harrison, & Homan; NB via Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Congress, & Homan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Homan/Harrison due to due to police activity..

Southbound buses will operate via Homan, Congress, Central Park, and Harrison, then resume their normal route on Homan.

Northbound buses will operate via Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, and Congress, then resume their normal route on Homan.

Allow extra travel time.
